category.name: File Caching
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: FMS_Use_SHA256_Tickets
preference.preference_description: Configures Teamcenter to use FMS tickets that have SHA256 digests. Restart the Teamcenter Server after changing this value for it to take effect. The default FMS tickets use MD5 digests which are deprecated from Tc13.1. The FMS master configuration should also be updated to reflect the use of SHA256 tickets using the ticketdigest element.
